description:
Goku and Frieza finally face off! With their powers matched, Frieza begins attacking Goku’s friends to catch him off guard. Frustrated, Vegeta pushes him to give it his all and face Frieza in his ultimate form!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash! Frieza vs Son Goku: This Is the Result of My Training!
Freezer und Goku stoßen aufeinander! – Das ist das Ergebnis meines Trainings!
Gekitotsu! Freeza tai Son Gokuu: Kore ga Ora no Shuugyou no Seika Da!
¡Impacto! ¡Freezer contra Son Goku! ¡El resultado del entrenamiento!
激突! フリーザVS[たい]孫悟空 これがオラの修行の成果だ!
